text: Blacksmith Scene is a 1893 American silent movie directed by William K.L. DicksonBlacksmith SceneBLACKSMITHING SCENE and stars Charles Kayser and John Ott. ==Actors== * Charles Kayser as Blacksmith * John Ott as Assistant ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:American silent movies Category:19th-century movies
title: Blacksmith Scene
